sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './Navbar.css' export default class Navbar extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { currency:"INR" } } componentDidMount(){ if( document.querySelector('.currency-select').value === "INR"){ this.setState({currency:"INR"}) } } render() { return <>
  • Men
  • Women
  • Accessories
  • Footwear
  • Trending
; } }
